title: Kijiji: Buy, Sell and Save on Local Deals
description:
Buy and sell - and make money with ease - on Canada's largest classifieds app. Browse tons of local listings in our marketplace,  in all kinds of categories. Use our features to post, chat, sell and make money in a snap!
DOWNLOAD KIJIJI’S FREE APP, SO YOU CAN:
Browse and shop anytime, anywhere, 24/7
Easily search and shop our marketplace for all kinds of great local stuff: new+used everything → cars, games, jewelry, and more
Find local tradesmen & service providers, including plumbers, cleaners, nannies and others
Check out local houses, condos and apartments for rent & sale
Post an ad. Make money. Sell stuff fast!
Make money and space by selling things you hardly use, whether it’s baby items, cars and auto parts, iPhones, game consoles, etc.
Explore useful tools to get more exposure for your ads and help you make a quick local sale
Keep on top of your game
Save your favourite items on the go. Check them out later
Connect with others in seconds via instant in-app chat
Edit your preferences and settings in a tap or two to get the most out of your app
We hope you enjoy your ride with Kijiji! Happy buying and selling!
